scripts.dev: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently --keepalive -n api,web,open -c auto "dotnet run --project apps/Api" "npm --prefix apps/Web run dev" "node ./scripts/open-dev.mjs"
scripts.dev:api: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently --keepalive -n api,open -c auto "dotnet run --project apps/Api" "node ./scripts/open-api.mjs"
scripts.dev:web: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently --keepalive -n web,open -c auto "npm --prefix apps/Web run dev" "node ./scripts/open-web.mjs"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix apps/Web install && dotnet restore apps/Api
scripts.db:add: dotenv -e .env -- dotnet ef migrations add --project apps/Api --startup-project apps/Api
scripts.db:update: dotenv -e .env -- dotnet ef database update --project apps/Api --startup-project apps/Api
scripts.db:remove: dotenv -e .env -- dotnet ef migrations remove --project apps/Api --startup-project apps/Api
scripts.db:drop: dotenv -e .env -- dotnet ef database drop --project apps/Api --startup-project apps/Api
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -n api,web "npm run start:api" "npm run start:web"
